MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA15 postcode area of Beith, affecting properties in Mains Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:44am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:49 PM on Monday, 11 January 2021.
